dataObject.content: Many Latino voters know from personal and family experience how U.S. foreign policies drive people from their homes.

annotationData.content: {"category":{"label":"Biased"},"rationale":" Statistics provided by the national survey of Latinos conducted in 2018 suggests that policy resulted in many deportations."}

{"category":{"label":"Biased"},"rationale":"It shows bias based on blanketing in the Latinos with people getting driven from their homes. An opinion statement without statistics to back up the claim."}
